DOC.brief_summary: We want to investigate the effects of pioglitazone on cardiovascular events in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Pioglitazone on Cardiovascular Outcome on Higashi-Saitama Trial in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Primary composite endpoints: Cardiovascular death Non-fatal myocardial infarction and angina Non-fatal stroke Renal failure (hemodialysis/doubling of serum creatinine) Secondary endpoints: urinary albumin excretion diabetic retinopathy hyperlipidemia hypertension gout
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes HbA1c: more than 7% and less than 9% insulin treatment
